metadata.title: Hoka Clifton 3 Women's Running Shoes - SS17
features: ***Update***No-Sew SpeedFrame Construction - Providing a seamless interior to reduce the risk of irritation, The SpeedFrame construction provides you with a lightweight and comfortable fit.
***Update***Accommodating Forefoot - Allows for better toe splay which helps to improve stability and comfort.
Air Mesh Upper - Allows ventilation to ensure the feet stay cool and dry.
Early-Stage Meta-Rocker - Helps encourage a guided gait cycle for a smooth roll from initial impact to toe-off.
(HIP) CMEVA Full-Length Midsole - Provides cushioning for increased impact protection and stability.
description: Hoka Clifton 3 Running Shoes - AW16 Treat your feet to an even better fit and feel in the new Hoka Clifton 3 neutral running shoes. The latest update to the Clifton series features an improved fit with a more accommodating forefoot, plus a new seamless speed frame construction at an even lighter weight! You'll still get that same amazing ride that delivers a light and smooth run every time. Redesigned Upper The Hoka One One Men's Clifton 3 Running Shoe has been redesigned with a lightweight, no-sew SpeedFrame construction to provide a seamless internal environment. This helps to reduce irritation and blistering that could occur during your training, thereby providing you with the greatest comfort whilst out on the road. In addition, the Clifton 3's upper now also features a more accommodating forefoot to allow for better toe splay; this, in turn, helps to improve stability and comfort for greater performance. The air mesh panels incorporated into the design allow for greater ventilation and air flow to ensure that the wearer's feet stay cool, dry and comfortable throughout. Extra stability is added through the addition of synthetic overlays, which tighten as you fasten the laces to secure the foot in place. Meta-Rocker Midsole The Early-Stage Meta-Rocker midsole geometry is specifically designed with a low heel-to-toe differential and a sculpted outsole to create a fulcrum effect. This encourages a guided gait cycle for greater stride efficiency, which, in turn, supports the wearer's natural form whilst promoting an efficient, smooth roll from heel strike to toe-off. The midsole has also been equipped with a (HIP) CMEVA full-length midsole which provides industry-leading cushioning for increased impact protection, comfort and stability. Additionally, the midsole foam provides a degree of energy return to ensure that your steps remain charged throughout your run. For a light, smooth ride, these shoes answer the call.
